scripts.build: sh -c 'if test -d src; then yarn exec tsc --build; else echo "No src directory found, skipping build"; fi'
scripts.lint: sh -c 'if test -d src; then cd ../../../.. && yarn exec eslint packages/infrastructure/postgresql/src --ext .ts; else echo "No src directory found, skipping lint"; fi'
scripts.typecheck: sh -c 'if test -d src; then cd ../../.. && yarn tsc --noEmit --project packages/infrastructure/postgresql; else echo "No src directory found, skipping typecheck"; fi'
